body: Perhaps this issue was fixed by https://github.com/golang/go/commit/f2662f2c938f2f9fd21067169b2aaec89f8d0e9f ie CL https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/11329? In particular the documentation after that CL says The example provided in the issue is incomplete/unrunnable even locally, but I wonder if was meant for html/template instead since that's what referred to there. Although, html/template documentation says the same thing
